definitions.definition: A spherical or ovoid organelle found in the cytoplasm of eukaryotic cells and containing genetic material separate from that of the host ; it is responsible for the conversion of food to usable energy in the form of ATP .

main_definition: ( cytology ) A spherical or ovoid organelle found in the cytoplasm of eukaryotic cells and containing genetic material separate from that of the host ; it is responsible for the conversion of food to usable energy in the form of ATP .
